author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pembury Lifestyle Says Acquisition Of A Rental Business
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Pembury Lifestyle Group:
* PEMBURY LIFESTYLE - ‍HAS ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT WITH ZEPHAN PROPERTIES TO ACQUIRE RENTAL INCOME STREAM AND A PROPERTY IN SANDTON​
* ‍TOTAL DEAL CONSIDERATION OF R159,000,000​ * ‍EFFECTIVE DATE OF ACQUISITION IS 1 FEBRUARY 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
